content: using just one woolstok bundle this quick knit set of mini hanks will create two adorable little bowls knit with 2 strands held together and felted just the right size to hold your keys snacks or small knitting notions experience * advanced beginner materials * woolstok bundle 100% fine highland wool 5g/12yds 12 mini hanks * size 13 9mm dpns or size to obtain gauge finished measurements * circumference 12 14 * height 2 2 1/2 color shown * woolstok neutral bundle no 1303k * woolstok cool bundle no 1304k
